hero.eyebrow: Submit a request for your pet
hero.title: Ask for support
hero.intro: Are you caring for a rat or another rodent and the treatment costs are starting to exceed your budget? Fill in the form – describe the situation, attach documents, and we’ll get back to you with information about the next steps.

header.title: Fill in the support request form
header.subtitle: The more details you provide (diagnosis, history, costs, attachments), the easier it will be for us to verify your request.

animalsCount.label: Number of animals included in the request

description.label: Request details
description.placeholder: Please describe your animal’s story, diagnosis, treatment so far, the plan recommended by the vet and what exactly the funds are needed for.

deadline.label: By when are the funds needed?

treatmentOngoing.label: Treatment is already in progress (current costs are being incurred).

needsInstallments.label: Payouts in several installments are needed (e.g. for long-term treatment).

otherFundraiserLink.label: Has a fundraiser already been organised elsewhere? (link)
otherFundraiserLink.placeholder: Paste the link to the fundraiser, if it exists

otherHelp.label: Is anyone else already helping?
otherHelp.placeholder: e.g. private fundraisers among friends, support from other organisations, etc.

petPhotos.label: Photos of the animal
petPhotos.hint: Add 1–5 clear photos – they will help tell your pet’s story.

documents.label: Documents, receipts, invoices, test results
documents.hint: Attach files confirming the costs and diagnosis (PDFs, photos of receipts, discharge summaries, etc.).

payoutName.label: Account holder’s name
payoutName.placeholder: Exactly as on the bank account

payoutAddress.label: Account holder’s address
payoutAddress.placeholder: Street, building/flat number, postal code, city, country
payoutAddress.hint: Provide the full address required for international transfers.

consentDataProcessing.label: I consent to the processing of my personal data for the purpose of handling this request, in accordance with the foundation’s privacy policy.

consentTruth.label: I declare that all information provided is true and the attached documents are authentic.

consentPublicStory.label: I consent to the publication of my pet’s story and the attached photos in the foundation’s materials (website, social media) for the purposes of the fundraiser.
